    • Method Detail

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Collision o)
        At insertion into a SortedSet of collisions, duplicates are ignored.

        By default, collisions are not treated as duplicates. But any implementing collision class can override the routine and thus define duplicates itself.

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Collision>
        See Also:
        Comparable.compareTo(Object)

      • discoverCollisions

                                                                 java.util.List<Droppable> droppables,

        Within the given objects, collisions are to be discovered. The calculation of collision time as the Comparator is of central relevance.

      • react

        public abstract void react(SimulationState state,
                           java.util.List<MotionTargetPanzer> panzerTargets,
                           SimulationMode simulationMode)
        Performs collision effects. Objects may be manipulated and removed from the state's objects lists.
        Parameters:
        state - SimulationState to manipulate
        panzerTargets - If forces are exerted, the motion targets must be updated
        simulationMode - - used for specific motion related effects

      • rediscoverCollisions

        public java.util.Collection<Collision> rediscoverCollisions(java.util.Collection<Collision> collisions,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<MotionTargetPanzer> panzerTargets,
                                                            java.util.ArrayList<MotionTargetLaunchable> projectileTargets)
        Once a collision response has taken place, the detected collisions with the two partners are no longer valid. A local (i.e. just with one of the two partners) collision redetection solves this problem.
        As further challenge the collision starting time differs now from the collision window's starting time, as only collisions that take place past the collision recently being reacted to are matter of consideration.

        At this moment of development, no collision rediscovery is implemented. The portion of affected collisions is estimated by around one to a hundred. This is why a test for correctness is difficult in the given time at the moment.
        If time is found for an implementation, follow the comments in the code. The routine is already used, so changes will take effect.

        Parameters:
        collisions -
        panzerTargets -
        projectileTargets -
        Returns:
